translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎…目前只针对这两起案件实施了逮捕

translation.zh: ‎所以 当时只能说她被捕了

translation.zh: ‎实验室有毒品失踪

translation.zh: ‎但冒着风险在第一天就说

translation.zh: ‎“嘿 我们得出的结论是这样的…”

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎不应该这么做的

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎一定就会产生疑问 那个实验室里

translation.zh: ‎什么是可靠的 什么是不可靠的

translation.zh: ‎很多功劳要归在卢克莱恩身上

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎是麻省西部的一名辩护律师

translation.zh: ‎毒品诉讼案中化学检测的部分

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎不涉及到告密者

translation.zh: ‎也没有警察去撞开家门

translation.zh: ‎就是穿着实验袍的人 低头看显微镜

translation.zh: ‎我觉得人们会假定

translation.zh: ‎在街上买的所有东西都名副其实

translation.zh:
‎所以 他们会觉得

translation.zh: ‎但是 在涉及到有相关记录

translation.zh: ‎或者是有犯罪记录的人的时候

translation.zh: ‎就我的经验来看

translation.en: the most vulnerable to being wrongfully convicted.
translation.zh: ‎他们很容易会被错误定罪

translation.zh: ‎所以 索尼娅法拉克被捕之后

translation.zh: ‎我知道我有很多毒品犯罪的委托人

translation.zh: ‎他们的证据是由她检测的

translation.zh: ‎所以 我立刻就觉得

translation.en: "This is gonna be a big deal for some of the people I represent."
translation.zh:
‎这对于我代理的一些人来说
‎会是一件很重大的事

translation.zh: ‎比如拉斐尔罗德里格兹

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我觉得他保护着我和我的孩子们

translation.zh: ‎不知道 我们在一起相处的时光

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎他总是能逗我们笑

translation.zh: ‎这是最有趣的部分

translation.zh: ‎他更像是我的朋友

translation.zh: ‎他更像是…

translation.zh: ‎比起父亲 他更像是我最好的朋友

translation.zh: ‎我在外面上班 他总是在家陪孩子

translation.zh:
‎他们会一起去公园玩
‎去很多地方 他们总是在外面玩

translation.zh: ‎到了夏天 他们会去

translation.zh: ‎公共泳池 去那边玩

translation.zh: ‎那个家伙就是在那里出现的

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.en: It was cocaine.
translation.zh: ‎是可卡因

translation.zh: ‎我一开始觉得很受伤 因为…

translation.zh:
‎我从一开始就一直和他说

translation.zh:
‎就告诉我 我可以帮助你
‎我们可以去寻求帮助

translation.zh: ‎他入狱之后 我告诉孩子们：

translation.en: "He did something bad and he's doing time."
translation.zh: ‎“他干了坏事 现在要服刑”

translation.en: I've never been an addict.
translation.zh: ‎我从来没当过瘾君子

translation.en: I-- I don't understand what they go through, or... or what sets them to... to want to use drugs.
translation.zh:
‎我不理解他们的经历

translation.en: We would go visit, we would play dominoes and... just spend time with him.
translation.zh: ‎我们会去探视他 ‎会一起玩多米诺骨牌 和他相处

translation.zh: ‎和你朋友聊这件事是什么样的感受？ ‎还是说你不会聊这个？

translation.en: I really didn't talk about it that much.
translation.zh: ‎我其实不太聊这个

translation.en: I have my few select friends that I talk to about my dad.
translation.zh:
‎我只会和特定的几个朋友
‎聊我爸爸的事

translation.en: Every crime has a set of elements, things the government has to prove
translation.zh:
‎每一项罪行都有很多元素
‎政府需要证明这些

translation.en: in order to establish that you're guilty of the crime.
translation.zh: ‎才能确立你是有罪的

translation.en: It can be something as simple as you're charged with drunk driving.
translation.zh: ‎不需要很复杂 比如你被控酒驾

translation.en: They need to prove that you were driving on a public street.
translation.zh:
‎他们就需要证明
‎你的确是在公共道路上行驶的

translation.en: You know, a guy takes a golf cart and drives around the golf course.
translation.zh:
‎比如有人开着高尔夫球车
‎在高尔夫球场上走

translation.en: Is that a public street or not?
translation.zh: ‎这算公共道路吗？

translation.en: So things that seem like silly details in a case
translation.zh: ‎所以 一个案子中看似愚蠢的细节

translation.en: actually become important.
translation.zh: ‎会变得非常重要

translation.en: In a drug case,
translation.zh: ‎在毒品案件中

translation.en: if you are prosecuted and charged with selling a joint,
translation.zh: ‎如果被控出售大麻烟

translation.en: the question is, is that really marijuana?
translation.zh: ‎问题就是里面是不是真的大麻？

translation.en: If it's not, you're not guilty.
translation.zh: ‎如果不是大麻 那你就无罪

translation.en: The government has to prove, and prove beyond a reasonable doubt,
translation.zh: ‎所以 政府需要证明 ‎且要排除合理怀疑

translation.en: that the thing they're accusing you of doing,
translation.zh: ‎证明你的确从事了

translation.en: which is against the law, you've actually done.
translation.zh: ‎他们指控中的非法行为

translation.zh:
‎我国面临着巨大的危机

translation.zh: ‎我们现在有了法律

translation.zh: ‎我们将会执行这些法律

translation.zh: ‎警方不需要搜查证

translation.zh: ‎就能进入怀疑藏有违法毒品的家庭

translation.en: [George HW Bush] This...
This is crack cocaine.
translation.zh: ‎就是快客可卡因

translation.en: It's as innocent-looking as candy.
translation.zh: ‎看起来像糖果一样无辜

translation.zh:
‎但就是这个东西
‎正将我们的城市变成战场

translation.en: [Daniel] If you're gonna fight a war on drugs,
translation.zh: ‎所以 如果要打禁毒战

translation.zh: ‎就需要把整个体系都建立起来

translation.zh:
‎这个体系需要寻找出那些
‎制造、运输、出售和使用

translation.en: the drugs you decide are illegal,
translation.zh: ‎你判定为违法毒品的人

translation.en: and then a system to prosecute them and imprison them.
translation.zh:
‎然后 还需要一个体系
‎对他们提起公诉并囚禁他们

translation.en: There are huge agencies at the local level, the state level, the federal level.
translation.zh: ‎地方层面、州层面和整个联邦层面 ‎都有很大规模的机构

translation.en: It's everything from the police officers to the prosecutors to the court officials
translation.zh: ‎从警方到检方到法院工作人员

translation.en: to the prison guards to the administrators to the lab scientists.
translation.zh: ‎到狱警和行政人员 ‎到实验室科学家

translation.en: There are billions of dollars that flood into this system
translation.zh: ‎为了将禁毒战继续打下去

translation.en: to perpetuate this war on drugs,
translation.zh: ‎已经投入了几十亿美元

translation.en: which we've now been fighting since the 1970s.
translation.zh: ‎这场仗从20世纪70年代就开始打了

translation.en: In order to convict someone
translation.zh: ‎所以 为了给一个

translation.en: because of some substances that we've decided are illegal,
translation.zh: ‎接触了我们定为非法物质的人定罪

translation.en: you need a scientist
translation.zh: ‎就需要科学家

translation.zh:
‎来检测这个物质

translation.zh: ‎“是海洛因”或“是大麻” ‎或者不是

translation.zh: ‎部分物质会组成特定的晶体结构

translation.zh: ‎这就是海洛因晶体

translation.zh: ‎这个是可卡因的晶体

translation.zh:
‎这是案件至关重要的一个部分
‎因为政府若无法证明这一点

translation.en: because if the government can't prove that, then they can't convict anyone.
translation.zh:
‎这是案件至关重要的一个部分
‎因为政府若无法证明这一点 ‎那就不能给任何人定罪

translation.en: So, when you get the evidence to your bench,
translation.zh: ‎把证据交给化学实验员后

translation.zh: ‎首先会对证据做一个初步的描述

translation.zh: ‎需要证实监管链

translation.en: uh, just making sure that all the dates and times
translation.zh: ‎查看各相关文件和项目

translation.en: and signatures and numbers match up
translation.zh: ‎确定所有的时间、日期、签名和数字

translation.en: as you, uh, look at the various paperwork and items.
translation.zh: ‎都对得上号

translation.zh: ‎然后 我们会进行一系列测试

translation.zh: ‎然后 我们会做专色测试

translation.zh:
‎基本上

translation.en: in a ceramic plate, a drop or two of each,
translation.zh: ‎放置少量不同的试剂 ‎每个凹槽放一两滴试剂

translation.en: and certain substances cause certain color changes with their agents.
translation.zh:
‎特定的物质在与试剂反应时
‎会导致特定的颜色变化

translation.en: With other substances, we would add some of the sample to a vial
translation.zh:
‎检测其他物质时
